website_summaries.verdict: Simple and easy. Satisfying meals. Recipes and menus help transition to this lifestyle.
pros: This is a 4-week program planned to jumpstart your journey into Mediterranean diet healthfulness
Oldways is a nonprofit devoted to good health, and is part of the group that first formally introduced this diet to consumers
cons: The book is very slim, and leans heavily vegetarian

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be put off by the small size
customer_reviews.text: I was initially disappointed because the book is so thin I didn’t think it was worth the money, but I’m actually very happy with it. It’s my 3rd attempt at buying a mediterranean diet book and this one I like. It has real life recipes that real people would actually cook and eat, not fancy weird stuff I would never cook or would never find the ingredients in a small town anyway. I will use many of these recipes, it will be very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Daizymaizey

customer_reviews.title: Great read
customer_reviews.text: This is a,very easy to read ,with an eating plan for each day of week. After each plan are the recipes for the dishes recommended .All are mouth watering meals I really enjoy this type of food so I know I won't find it hard to follow. There is a nutritional chart and calorie chart. If you want to be healthy I believe this way of eating is the way to go. A very uncomplicated book to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Prue Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful book that is a great aid in helping lose ...
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful book that is a great aid in helping lose those extra pounds. It is easy to use, ingredients do not call for exotic spices, and can be swapped for other days. It really helps keep you on track. I highly recommend this to everyone who wants to eat a good sensible diet.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A NUNI Hancy-Learman

customer_reviews.title: Undeniably the best
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. I bought one three years ago for myself. It’s absolutely the best Mediterranean diet book anywhere. It’s so simple yet comprehensive. It doesn’t bog you down with s lot of commentary. It just gives you 28 days’ of simple menus, snacks and recipes. I highly recommend it. I painlessly lost 62 pounds in just a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Gail T Brown

customer_reviews.title: Kindle book I'm Glad I Bought
customer_reviews.text: I open this book on one of my Kindles a few times every week. It has become an old friend. It has a menu for every day of the month, and MOST of the recipes I've used have been sensible and tasty. It is easy to take notes on my Fire tablets inside the book, so my thoughts about particular menus and recipes can be there for me later. There is no doubt it is healthy, but I wanted to add that it is practical , and easy too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oldways 4-Week Mediterranean Diet Minu Plan
customer_reviews.text: This little booklet is full of delicious, easy to prepare recipes. It's nicely illustrated and is just fun to read, as well. I've gotten more great recipes out of this book than some of the bigger, more expensive books I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: F. Elst

customer_reviews.title: Neatest Little Book
customer_reviews.text: Some books are recipe books with glamous Mediterranean dishes that take time to make. This little book has awesome everyday ideas. It gets more use than some of the “better” Mediterranean Cookbooks I have and love.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Horton

customer_reviews.title: Terrific little book
customer_reviews.text: This small book is full of good information and a sensible 14-day eating plan to introduce the Mediterranean diet. The recipes are simble and do not call for exotic ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Bright Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This book is so thin and incomplete in discussion of the basics of the diet system that I would consider it a waste of $ at even a $5. purchase price. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: odona

customer_reviews.title: We went through this book together with a nutritionist in ...
customer_reviews.text: We went through this book together with a nutritionist in the cardiac rehab center after my husband's heart attack. It is simple but helps with basic meal planning and understanding just what the Mediterranean diet is.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene E. Capshaw

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Book
customer_reviews.text: Loved this book. It explained a lot and helped me to understand what the Diet was all about. It has a 28 day diet plan together with Menus, shopping guide and healthful eating suggestions together with substitutions for some items. On each of the days there are recipes included for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Changing the way you cook and eat could not be easier.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: It is simple and easy to follow with easy to find ingredients
customer_reviews.text: It is simple and easy to follow with easy to find ingredients. The meal plans are conveniently followed by the recipes which makes it easy to make a shopping list. I'm enjoying the meals and at the same time am learning how to plan a balanced plate. I will be moving on to more complex recipes soon, but for now this book is an excellent introduction to the Mediterranean diet. If I had started with a traditional cookbook I probably would have given up already.
customer_reviews.author: L. S. Sykes

customer_reviews.title: A  Very Good Basic Guide
customer_reviews.text: My cardiologist mentioned a Mediterranean Diet as being very heart healthy. Although I had some idea of what that was, this little book really helped us get started
customer_reviews.author: George B. Kirby

customer_reviews.title: New to the Mediterranean Diet
customer_reviews.text: Although the book is rather small, it holds a great deal of good recipes. Not having eaten a Mediterranean diet prior to ordering the book I was not looking forward to cutting back on meat products (I do like steak, porkchops, etc.), but the non-meat recipes were excellent and beans do make an excellent replacement for meat products. I would not have believed this a couple of weeks ago. Yes, I would recommend the book to anyone considering a change in eating habits.
customer_reviews.author: Carol E. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Easy, nutritious and simple but tasty recipes.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Mediterranean diet book Simple, easy and nutritious, delightful recipes. Loved the ample breakfast ideas as well. Quick and easy breakfast ideas are hard to come by. I don't want to be bogged down with complicated breakfast ideas in the morning. Can't wait to try the lunch and dinner meals.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen Coyle

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Cuts through all the diet BS. If you want scientific nutrition info this book is not for you. If you want to just lose weight, this book IS FOR YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: The Healthiest Eating made Simple
customer_reviews.text: Spells out the whole scheme of things for healthy eating. (Includes many recipes that I'm sure are delicious---haven't tried them yet, however.)
customer_reviews.author: Gi Yundt

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: You're better off looking through the Internet for recipes or spending a couple of $$ more for a real cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great book for embarking on a healthier eating plan
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book for embarking on a healthier eating plan. The recipes are easy and delicious. I lost 6 pounds the first 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette M. Hoopfer

customer_reviews.title: Great for get up & go.
customer_reviews.text: This book goes right into the diet menu. Great if your a go getter starter or if you want a clear understanding of what your doing. Good recipes, haven't had one I didn't like yet. Since I did order the Dummies Mediterranean Diet Cookbook with this what information isn't covered in here can be found in that. I do recommend if you want to get started on the Diet without stumbling that a person start with this one. Takes out a lot of guess work.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Miller

customer_reviews.title: Just a sample
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the ebook but only got the sample. I have a hard copy and love it but wanted to have it portable.
customer_reviews.author: Living the dream

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! Had to buy another copy recently because I ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful ! Had to buy another copy recently because I actually wore the other one out! My Dr had lost a lot of weight and she recommended it to me. Have incorporated this and the Sonoma plan and have been very pleased for 5 years now......except when I'm bad ! Then I just jump back in to this Mediterranean lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: WEEZIE

customer_reviews.title: Really Simple Plan
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this plan is to follow, no fancy ingredients or major cooking, you can mix and match the days and meals to your personal preferences, and the information on the Mediterranean-style of eating is concise and informative. Very interesting and easy read. I can carry this little book in my purse when I go grocery shopping, or to restaurants for guidance on what to eat. Aimed towards dining at home, though, so you know exactly what ingredients are in your food.
customer_reviews.author: PLC

customer_reviews.title: Sensational!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best little book I have read in quite some time and I'm sure going to recommend it to anyone interested in eating the Mediterranean way. it is simple and easy to incorporate into your daily menus. Without fail, this will become your go to cookbook after reading it. And guess what? The food actually tastes every bit as good as you can imagine! Hope you enjoy it as much as I have
customer_reviews.author: Lady Ike

customer_reviews.title: GreatRecipes
customer_reviews.text: Great Recipes that are easy to follow. The only thing missing in this book is a shopping list to make it easier to purchase ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Editor_Choice

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS
customer_reviews.text: I would absolutely recommend!! Really fast shipping and great customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Tubré

customer_reviews.title: Delicious & Healthy
customer_reviews.text: The recipes take time but are easy with the instructions given. I am able to prepare some ahead of time and reheat leftovers for lunch or dinner the following day. It also helps me to further understand the Mediterranean way of eating which is healthy for the heart and many other things with all the vegetables, etc. included in many of the meals.
customer_reviews.author: Rhemagrl

customer_reviews.title: Exellent
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to try a Mediterranean diet for awhile due to its health benefits. So far this has been an excellent book with recipes that are quite good. It's presented in a straight to the point manner with not a lot of fluff added just to make the book thicker. If you are truly wanting a taste of what the Mediterranean diet is all about, then this book is a perfect start!
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Grimlin

customer_reviews.title: Healthy on a budget!
customer_reviews.text: this little cook book has changed my family's diet for the better. Simple. Quick. Just a few ingredients. HIGHLY recommend if you are looking to be healthier on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: JPBURDEN

customer_reviews.title: Weight Loss and eating great food.
customer_reviews.text: I am only cooking for myself. And I don't like to cook a lot at my age. This book has small recipes and larger ones (4 or more) but there are recipes I like to eat. I have cook some recipes in the book that are very good. I have been on it for Two weeks now and I have lost Three (3) pounds. Yea!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: A good basic
customer_reviews.text: A nice little introduction for those curious about the Mediterranean Diet and a good start to the diet. At its low price, it's a good book for the beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Jute196

customer_reviews.title: I really love this book-it is easy to read and understand-for anyone ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love this book-it is easy to read and understand-for anyone who is interested in this diet I would highly recommend this little book
customer_reviews.author: Mary R

customer_reviews.title: Number 1 diet/ lifestyle food
customer_reviews.text: No hassle no measuring, just simple food that is heart healthy. I see this being easily done. I’m day 4 and so far satisfied and not really missing anything
customer_reviews.author: Driftencowgirl

customer_reviews.title: simple, yummy food
customer_reviews.text: Recipes were simple and did not take a load of ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Ridgewalker

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful book!
customer_reviews.text: We received this book & started using it right away. I needed to switch to a more healthful diet & the Mediterranean diet was suggested. The meals included in this book are much more tasty than I thought they would be. I would recommend this book for someone needing to make a diet change for better health & to lose some weight.
customer_reviews.author: Raye

customer_reviews.title: It is simple to understand and very informative.
customer_reviews.text: It is the first book I have purchased on the Mediterranean Diet. It explains the basics in simple terms, and has easy recipes to get you started. I think it's a great introduction to this diet.
customer_reviews.author: Janet K.

customer_reviews.title: Simply wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific entry into the Mediterranean Diet for people who want to change their eating habits. This is a menu plan for 28-days, not a big recipe book. The recipes are simple and easy to follow. By the way, the non-profit who publishes this book has a wonderful website. Search for "Oldways".
customer_reviews.author: C. Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Totally Awesome, Thank you.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to change your life style way of eating. I would and already have recommended this to several people that I know. I love the way it gives you meal ideas and then the recipe s you need for that day. I started incorporating this into my life style way of eating about a month ago and lost 10 pounds in about 3 weeks. Great book!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Good Simple Guide to Mediterranean Eating
customer_reviews.text: This simple guide is a great introduction to the Mediterranean way of eating. It has a meal plan, definitions, some simple recipes and all around does a good job as an introduction. As you progress with the plan, you'll want to branch out and find some additional recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine M. Wiant

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: After using the book Mediterranean Prescription and was looking for other recipes and a weekly plan until I became familiar with the Mediterranean lifestyle and this book is just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bass

customer_reviews.title: Great Tips on What to Eat When
customer_reviews.text: Although I have cookbooks galore, this is one of my favorites. There are simple, easy recipes. When you are trying to think of something healthy to eat for breakfast, lunch or dinner, just glance in this little book and there is a great suggestion. You can plan a whole week's worth of meals easily with recipes the entire family will enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great book. The layout and design are excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great book. The layout and design are excellent. Recipes are great and simple- which makes this diet actually realistic to follow. Other books have complex recipes with dozens of ingredients. These recipes are delicious and simple. Very healthy long term diet.
customer_reviews.author: SBSurfer

customer_reviews.title: Lost a few pounds!
customer_reviews.text: This book is very helpful and full of lots of info and yummy recipes. I lost about 5 lbs in the two weeks we stuck with it. Lately it's been hard to do it since we've been so busy, some of the recipes take long than I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Stonedragon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent intro to Mediterranean eating.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and myself, as we were interested in Mediterranean eating. It's a great intro to the lifestyle and the foods are delicious. I'm very glad I bought this book, and especially happy with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Don Haynes Jr

customer_reviews.title: Love this way to eat!
customer_reviews.text: Live by this way of eating! Easy to follow and great suggestions for variety.
customer_reviews.author: pollyanna

customer_reviews.title: I do love the variety of recipes
customer_reviews.text: Interesting little book. This is a different type of cooking for me and some of the recipes a a little too different. I do love the variety of recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great ideas, delicious meals
customer_reviews.text: As someone new to the mediterranean diet, I had no idea what to eat. This book was very helpful, had wonderful recipes and really laid out four weeks of an eating plan. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ponder

customer_reviews.title: Very interesting!
customer_reviews.text: Great little cookbook for starting out with a Mediterranean diet and lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: BG1955

customer_reviews.title: Great way to start
customer_reviews.text: So easy to follow. No fancy ingredients you have to find in a specialty store. Easy tasty recipes. No time wasted on all the science just good tasty food.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi2six

customer_reviews.title: Really like this book
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the book is organized. Recipes are simple and taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara I. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay introduction to the Mediterranean Diet, but not exactly what I was hoping for in terms of recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Forchin8

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of information for anyone starting a Mediterranean diet. Easy to follow, day by day recipes and helpful hints. I have already made several of the recipes and they are great!
customer_reviews.author: AllieB

customer_reviews.title: Small but Good Information
customer_reviews.text: It was a small book. I expected a larger book, but it does have some good information in it I would recommend it to others
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: This is better
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot easier and simple for me to follow - thinking of time, as I don't have much of that to spend in the kitchen right now. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Ciresa

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great guide that gets right to the point and is very easy to follow!
customer_reviews.author: ramz

customer_reviews.title: wow  learned a lot
customer_reviews.text: this book is amazing..it has tons of recipes and scientific evidence as to why this diet is great for weight loss, healthy eating and is written by a person who knows what he is talking about (being an MD and a Mediterranean descendant) Love his Mom's recipes!!! Yahoo!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Namvar

customer_reviews.title: Was very pleased with the recipes
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with the recipes, they will be easy to prepare and nutritious. Shipping time was short. Very pleased with service.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanice M

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: My cousin actually sent me this book from Amazon, I then sent it to a few friends and family members who are using it and loving it. Really great find and way of eating.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce L

customer_reviews.title: Nice Idea..
customer_reviews.text: I liked the concept of the book: menu on one side, recipe on the other. It wasn't what I was expecting, a little too vegetarian for me. It's perfectly put together though. The breakfast ideas are great, the wraps are a good idea. Overall it's ok. I will utilize it to add to my menus.
customer_reviews.author: have3 kidstoo

customer_reviews.title: Good Book Expensive Postage
customer_reviews.text: Will try some of the recipes but was not exactly what I was looking for,but still quality for money,but the post is too expensive for me here in Australia.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great little book
customer_reviews.text: This book although small has great info in it. I have made several of the recipes and they are easy to make without having a lot of ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: BRE11

customer_reviews.title: Pictures are great
customer_reviews.text: Our doctor recommended we get a Mediterranean cookbook for a healthy diet, this easy to use and pictures are great.
customer_reviews.author: JaniceM

customer_reviews.title: Simple ingredients and flavorful.
customer_reviews.text: I have liked most of the recipes. Inexpensive, simple, flavorful, and everthing was easy to find at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic cookbook
customer_reviews.text: Great introduction to the mediterranean style of cooking. So far every recipe has been yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy g

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite. It has everything you need to know
customer_reviews.author: gail o'meara

customer_reviews.title: Best cookbook I own
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to lose weight and eat healthier and this is the perfect book. It explains what you should eat if trying to eat a whole foods more Mediterranean way. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Neff

customer_reviews.title: Mediterranean simplified
customer_reviews.text: Very informatiive and s easy to follow with many good recipes. Would recommend to anyone thinking about the way of eating
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: wonderful surprise
customer_reviews.text: This little book is a treasure. No fancy pictures, no outrageous health claims, just good, sensible advice. The recipes are easy to make, delicious, and satisfying. I find that I can do a lot of switching around in this book -- many of the menus for breakfast and lunch also make great suppers. This is one of the best books I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Guttman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good book. Got a lot of good ideas for heathy eating.
customer_reviews.author: Art Druckenmiller

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a cookbook that would give me recipes suggestion and this gives some great recipes. I plan on trying them all
customer_reviews.author: Judith Earnhart

customer_reviews.title: Great Book
customer_reviews.text: My cardiologist recommended this for me. It is a very easy plan to follow. The recipes are simple yet very flavorful.
customer_reviews.author: PHS

customer_reviews.title: Very good Mediterranian  cookbook
customer_reviews.text: This book is a great guide for everyday cooking in a healthy, time-honored tradition. The recipes are delicious and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: DJP

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!!
customer_reviews.text: Not only a short, concise beginning guide for a clinically proven diet and lifestyle choice, but a number of well tested, simple recipes: Easily obtained ingredients, logical, precise instructions, well proportioned servings resulting in fabulous meals.
customer_reviews.author: Elbert Breeding

customer_reviews.title: Helpful to a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Since I am just beginning to follow the Mediterranean diet. Good way to begin. Recipes are easy to follow and reasonable ingrediences.
customer_reviews.author: butterflies

customer_reviews.title: Make every day count with the Mediterranian 4-week diet Meal Plan
customer_reviews.text: I like the colors of different foods on the cover. I like the healthy eating pyramid. very easy to follow the foods looks tasty. The diet menu is simple with foods I can purchase at most any near by grocery store. It's a healthy eating lifestyle I can do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful cookbook. The recipes are so easy. I use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Great book!
customer_reviews.text: very nice book. I actually lost weight on this plan without feeling im on a diet. definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: wedgelover

customer_reviews.title: Mediterranean Diet
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this book as my health provider suggested this diet for my cholesterol readings. Felt I would benefit from the recommended foods for the diet.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C. Srader

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow and love the meal plans. All the food I love to eat. Just a healthy way of eating--not necessarily for losing a lot of weight.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Book Contents
customer_reviews.text: This book is a very short, no nonsense version of the mediterranean diet ways. Its a nice book to stick in your purse and go while going to a restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Pressley

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Pros: menu plan, easy recipes, substitution chart, food tastes great Cons: some items are hard to find i.e. bulgur, quioa if you don't know what they are,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy menus
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this style eating simply because it includes so many items I am able to have with the Advocare program I'm on.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Dashnaw

customer_reviews.title: Very simple
customer_reviews.text: Sweet and simple easy to follow and COMPREHEND makes the "program" easy to learn and gives you what you need to know to make better choices
customer_reviews.author: Susan K.

customer_reviews.title: Good book
customer_reviews.text: It was very helpful and the descriptions for recipes are simple to follow, with the ingredients easy. I enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Andrews

customer_reviews.title: A new, clean way to eat!
customer_reviews.text: I've read through the book and am excited to try the 4 week plan!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Gooding

customer_reviews.title: I think this is one of the best menu plans I've ever seen!
customer_reviews.text: This book is fantastic! It's logical, easy to follow, and has really tasty, easy to follow recipes. This small, soft cover book is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Quigleezmom

customer_reviews.title: Non-user friendly
customer_reviews.text: This has great menus and recipes, but for one or two people, the day-to-day variety would require massive shopping. And there's no shopping list, no use of leftovers, no reuse of basic perishable ingredients within the perishable time for what one cannot buy a cup of. While the ideas are good, the author should have given this a bit more thought for an audience of less than a family of four or five and for those who live in the real world of not shopping several times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy intro to med diet
customer_reviews.text: Simple/tasty med diet recipes. Helpful day-to-day menus so you can see what a med diet should look like even if you don't follow the menus exactly.
customer_reviews.author: W. K. Harold

customer_reviews.title: The Oldways 4-week Mediterranean cookbook
customer_reviews.text: This book is clear and easy to read. The first 13 pages provide a simple limited overview of the Mediterranean diet. Pages 14 - 70 provide suggested daily menus on the left page of the book with a recipe or two on the opposite page. Menus and recipes are very easy to understand. Pages 71-78 provide dieting tips and food nutrition values. Not as much information as I had wanted but what information that is that is helpful I probably wouldn't buy again as I need more recipes and guidance. But it is a good start I think.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Lots of easy to make recipes. No trouble finding the ingredients. We liked almost all of them. Tips for healthy, quick eating. Most useful Mediterranean cookbook I have come across. Nutrition info in the index.
customer_reviews.author: Ruralcindy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for to become and stay healthy.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for becoming and staying healthy. We should all be more aware of how to live a more natural life.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Manning

customer_reviews.title: Not the end all, be all book
customer_reviews.text: It was a good book and I would recommend it. The menus are kind of bland, and the diet is severe, but if you need results quick, this book gets you on the right track quickly. Probably not sustainable for long term use as I see it tho.
customer_reviews.author: Ozark Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great book great menu plan most foods are normal to buy and love the way they use leftovers for next day
customer_reviews.author: Diane's Designs

customer_reviews.title: Simple recipes that have great taste!
customer_reviews.text: I love this book because it offers really simple easy recipes that are healthy & good. I bought another Mediterranean cookbook in the past & the spices that were used weren't regular spices so the taste, although may have been authentic to true Mediterranean food, was unfamiliar & no one in my house wanted to eat it. This book has simple easy to get ingredients & everyone in my house has enjoyed the recipes while eating healthy at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Colson

customer_reviews.title: but the recipes don't taste very good.
customer_reviews.text: The eating recommendations are decent and often helpful, but the recipes don't taste very good.
customer_reviews.author: Skylark Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and delicious
customer_reviews.text: I just want to be healthy and thinner. i have integrated these recipes into my daily life and have lost weight and am feeling better, I gave up butter and only use olive oil now, Even my meat and potatoes husband is becoming a believer.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ok - Not good for me - Had to give up too many foods I love.
customer_reviews.author: MANHATTANMISS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent book!
customer_reviews.text: I love mediterranian style cooking, and wanted to get healthier. I have a good number of mediterranian books already, but decided to purchase this anyway. I'm so glad I did! The others sit on my shelf due to lack of time to cook...this book is by far the simplest, easiest book on mediterranian eating I have seen. I have been following the menu plan for several days and my energy is skyrocketed, I swear my cut healed faster (I had cut my hand just before starting), and it is just plain awesome. Buy this book!
customer_reviews.author: NM11

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried any recipes, yet the book is truly an inspiration.
customer_reviews.author: Curlyann

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Part the Wine
customer_reviews.text: The book was just as it said it was and the condition was right on, the contents was good but Mediterranean Diet makes me whine accept for the wine allowable to drink.
customer_reviews.author: winsey
